name: Sugar and Spice[DEMO]
description:
The selfish Princess Spice has stole sweet Princess Sugar's crown and banished her to the dungeons of Cocoa Castle.

Help Sugar escape her prison, battle through the vile Cookie Creeps, traverse the chocolate coated wastes of Cookie Kingdom and return home to take back her throne!

This project is currently in a seriously unfinished state.

Not all features are in or functional.

It is broken as hell.

I am very sorry.

Controls;

Press (Action) to get to the Menu

Press (Start) to select an option in the Menu

Controller -

Start = Start

Move = Analog Stick or D-Pad

Action = Up on D-Pad or Analog Stick

Jump = X ( A on Xbox controller)

Shoot (Need Gumball) = O (B on Xbox controller)

Smash Attack (Need Crown) = Hold Jump and Press Down

Quit = Select

Keyboard -

Start = Enter

Move = WASD or Arrows

Action = Up or W

Jump = Space

Shoot (Need Gumball) = Z

Smash Attack (Need Crown) = Hold Jump and Press Down

Quit = Escape
